resources.string: Automatically switch to a preferred network when both WLAN network and mobile network are available.
You can always go to WLAN preferences to change the setup later.
When a WLAN network is detected to have poor connection quality, mobile network will be used instead. When turned off, WLAN connection will be prioritized.
This feature won\'t affect applications that limit connections to WLAN only or mobile network only
Using Sony\'s deep learning technology, Smart connectivity always provides the best network connection by automatically switching between 4G/5G and WLAN depending on the network quality.
Use mobile network when WLAN quality is poor

Predict network conditions by analyzing WLAN signal data. If poor WLAN network quality is expected, this will automatically switch to a mobile network. WLAN connection will be prioritized for home network use.
Prevent auto connection to poor quality WLAN networks
Stop auto connection when poor WLAN quality is expected. This can help prevent your device from automatically switching to lower quality public WLAN.
Smart connectivity has predicted that %1$s is of poor quality, and temporarily prevented automatic connection to this WLAN network.
Preventing auto connection to poor quality WLAN network
